subtitle: Private Browsing & Payments Tunnel
privacyDrawerIntro: Privxx is designed to protect your metadata, not just encrypt content.
privacyDrawerPoint1: Privxx hides your IP address and location (design goal).
privacyDrawerPoint2: Privxx uses mixnet technology (cMixx) to remove network metadata.
privacyDrawerPoint3: Privxx is built to use post-quantum-safe cryptography.
privacyDrawerPoint4: Privxx will not store your browsing history or persistent identifiers.
privacyDrawerPoint5: Privxx will never use analytics or tracking.
proxyPlaceholder: Proxied content will appear here in a future version.
simulationNotice: This is a simulated prototype of Privxx. Real cMixx integration will be added in a later phase.
